title: Practice Challenge
description:
Build a simplified full-stack blog:

1. Create a `database` object with:
   - posts array with sample posts (id, title, content)
   - findAll() method
   - create(data) method

2. Create a `backend` object with:
   - handleGetPosts() - returns all posts
   - handleCreatePost(title, content) - creates post

3. Create a `BlogApp` object with:
   - state: posts, loading
   - fetchPosts() - calls backend
   - createPost(title, content) - calls backend and refreshes

4. Test the flow
instructions:
Build a simplified full-stack blog:

1. Create a `database` object with:
   - posts array with sample posts (id, title, content)
   - findAll() method
   - create(data) method

2. Create a `backend` object with:
   - handleGetPosts() - returns all posts
   - handleCreatePost(title, content) - creates post

3. Create a `BlogApp` object with:
   - state: posts, loading
   - fetchPosts() - calls backend
   - createPost(title, content) - calls backend and refreshes

4. Test the flow

hints.text: Follow the pattern: Frontend → Backend → Database → Backend → Frontend

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to enable CORS on backend
commonMistakes.consequence: Browser blocks cross-origin requests from frontend to backend.
commonMistakes.correction: Add app.use('*', cors()) in your Hono backend.

commonMistakes.consequence: Missing http:// causes fetch to fail or look in wrong location.
commonMistakes.correction: Use full URL with protocol: http://localhost:4000/api/todos
